document.full_text: good weather looks 70 percent likely for monday's scheduled launch of endeavour, the next-to-last u.s. space shuttle mission as nasa develops a new generation of craft for longer voyages.
document.title: nasa ready to launch shuttle endeavour on monday
lines_and_colors: good weather looks 70 percent likely for monday's scheduled launch of endeavour, the next-to-last u.s. space shuttle mission as nasa develops a new generation of craft for longer voyages.
